description: National Occupational Classification (NOC) mapping for career database

software_engineer.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
software_engineer.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in computer and information systems
main_duties: Analyze user's requirements and design, develop and implement computer software applications
Research, design, evaluate and integrate computer software and hardware systems
Identify and resolve software issues and defects
Prepare reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software
Coordinate and oversee the development activities of a team of software engineers
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer engineering, electrical or electronics engineering, engineering physics or computer science
Master's or doctoral degree in computer engineering, electrical or electronics engineering, engineering physics or computer science may be required
Licensing by a provincial or territorial association of professional engineers is required

registered_nurse.noc_title: Registered nurses and registered psychiatric nurses
main_duties: Assess patients to identify appropriate nursing interventions
Collaborate with members of the health care team to plan, implement, coordinate and evaluate patient care
Deliver direct nursing care to patients
Provide health education and counselling to patients and their families
Supervise licensed practical nurses, registered practical nurses and other nursing staff
employment_requirements: Completion of a three- or four-year nursing degree program
Registration with a provincial or territorial nursing regulatory body is required
Recent graduate nurses may require a period of supervised practice

mechanical_engineer.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
main_duties: Design power plants, machines, components, tools, fixtures and equipment
Analyze dynamics and vibrations of mechanical systems and structures
Supervise and inspect the installation, modification and commissioning of mechanical systems
Develop maintenance standards, schedules and programs
Investigate mechanical failures or unexpected maintenance problems
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering or in a related engineering discipline
Master's or doctoral degree in a related engineering discipline may be required
Licensing by a provincial or territorial association of professional engineers is required

graphic_designer.noc_broad_category: Occupations in art, culture, recreation and sport
graphic_designer.noc_minor_group: Technical occupations related to art, culture and recreation
main_duties: Consult with clients to determine the nature and content of illustrations and graphic designs
Develop the graphic elements that meet the clients' objectives
Prepare sketches, layouts and graphic elements of the subjects to be rendered
Use traditional tools, multimedia software and image processing, layout and design software
Adapt existing illustrations and graphic designs
employment_requirements: Completion of a college program in graphic arts, commercial art, graphic communications or cartooning
Bachelor's degree in fine arts with specialization in graphic design or commercial art may be required
Creative ability and artistic talent, as demonstrated by a portfolio of work, are required

marketing_manager.noc_title: Advertising, marketing and public relations managers
main_duties: Plan, direct and evaluate the activities of firms and departments that develop and implement advertising campaigns
Plan, organize, direct, control and evaluate the design, development and production of multimedia advertising
Establish advertising contract agreements
Assist in preparing budgets and approve budget expenditures
Plan, organize, direct, control and evaluate the development and implementation of communication strategies
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in business administration, commerce, marketing, communications or journalism
Several years of experience in advertising, marketing, public relations or communications
Specialization in a particular area such as business, journalism or communications may be required

data_scientist.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
data_scientist.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in mathematics, statistics and actuarial science
main_duties: Collect, process and analyze large structured and unstructured data sets
Interpret data and analyze results using statistical techniques
Develop predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
Combine models through ensemble modeling
Present information using data visualization techniques
Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics or related discipline
Master's or doctoral degree in a related field may be required
Experience with database management, programming languages and statistical software is required

elementary_teacher.noc_broad_category: Education, law and social, community and government services
main_duties: Teach basic subjects such as reading, writing and arithmetic or specialized subjects
Prepare subject material for presentation to students according to an approved curriculum
Develop and implement special programs for students with specific needs
Assign and correct homework and tests
Evaluate students' progress and discuss results with students, parents and school officials
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in education or in the subject matter to be taught
Bachelor's degree and a teacher training program may be required
Provincial or territorial licence or certification to teach is required

financial_advisor.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in business and finance
main_duties: Examine and analyze accounting and financial records
Prepare financial statements and reports
Audit accounting and financial records
Evaluate financial controls and procedures
Provide advice on taxation, investment and other financial matters
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance, commerce or business administration
Completion of a professional training program in accounting
Licence or certification with a provincial or territorial accounting association may be required

cybersecurity_analyst.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
cybersecurity_analyst.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in computer and information systems
main_duties: Analyze systems requirements and develop information systems plans
Design computer systems and establish specifications for programmers
Develop and implement information systems
Conduct tests and perform security and quality audits of computer systems
Operate and manage information systems and advise on their efficient use
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science, computer systems engineering, software engineering or mathematics
Master's degree in business administration may be required
Certification or training provided by software vendors may be required

social_worker.noc_broad_category: Education, law and social, community and government services
social_worker.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in social and community services
main_duties: Interview clients individually, in families, or in groups, to assess their situation and problems
Develop and implement intervention plans to address identified problems
Advocate for clients to obtain services and resources
Provide counselling and therapy to assist clients in developing skills
Act as mediator and liaise between conflicting parties
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in social work
Master's degree in social work may be required
Registration or licence with a provincial or territorial association is usually required

ux_designer.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
ux_designer.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in computer and information systems
main_duties: Consult with clients to develop and document Website requirements
Prepare mock-ups and storyboards
Design and integrate Website components
Conduct tests and perform security and quality audits
Plan, design, write and modify Website related code
employment_requirements: College diploma or bachelor's degree in computer science, communications, business or related discipline
Experience with computer programming and graphic design may be required
Creative ability as demonstrated by a portfolio is required

environmental_scientist.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
environmental_scientist.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in natural and applied sciences
main_duties: Plan and conduct studies of the environment
Plan and conduct studies on the impact of human activities on the environment
Conduct field surveys and collect samples for analysis
Conduct laboratory and field tests and experiments
Compile information, write technical reports and provide scientific advice
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in biology, chemistry, environmental science or related discipline
Master's or doctoral degree may be required
Registration with a provincial or territorial association may be required

project_manager.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
main_duties: Research, design, evaluate and implement engineering solutions
Plan and manage projects from conception to completion
Prepare contracts and project specifications
Supervise engineering projects and coordinate work of technologists, technicians and other engineers
Conduct feasibility studies and prepare reports
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in engineering or related discipline
Master's degree or specialized training may be required
Licensing by a provincial or territorial association of professional engineers is required
Project management certification may be required

physical_therapist.noc_minor_group: Professional occupations in therapy and assessment
main_duties: Assess patients' physical abilities through evaluative procedures
Establish treatment goals with patients based on physical diagnoses
Plan and implement physiotherapy treatment plans
Evaluate treatment outcomes and modify treatment plans as required
Communicate with the referring physician and other health care professionals
employment_requirements: Master's degree in physiotherapy
Completion of a clinical internship in physiotherapy
Registration with provincial or territorial regulatory body is required

renewable_energy_engineer.noc_broad_category: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
main_duties: Research, design and develop renewable energy systems
Conduct feasibility studies for renewable energy projects
Design and optimize wind, solar, hydro and other renewable energy systems
Analyze environmental impact and sustainability of energy projects
Coordinate renewable energy projects and work with multidisciplinary teams
employment_requirements: Bachelor's degree in electrical, mechanical, environmental or chemical engineering
Master's degree in renewable energy engineering or related field may be required
Licensing by a provincial or territorial association of professional engineers is required
Experience with renewable energy technologies and sustainability principles

0.title: Management occupations
0.description: Usually require university graduation and/or a significant amount of experience

B.title: Technical occupations and skilled trades
B.description: Usually require college education or apprenticeship training

C.title: Intermediate occupations
C.description: Usually require high school and/or occupation-specific training

broad_categories: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
Education, law and social, community and government services
Occupations in art, culture, recreation and sport
Trades, transport and equipment operators and related occupations
Natural resources, agriculture and related production occupations

notes.wage_data: Median wages are based on Statistics Canada Labour Force Survey data and may vary by province, experience level, and other factors
notes.job_prospects: Job prospects are rated as Very good, Good, Fair or Limited based on employment growth projections and labour market indicators
notes.licensing: Many professional occupations require licensing or certification by provincial or territorial regulatory bodies
